smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

The function onActivityCreated appears to be too complex.

The function onCreate appears to be too complex.

The function toHumanReadableTime appears to be too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: File 'Extensions.kt' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function getChannelVideos has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function getPagePosts has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: EmptyElseBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: EmptyDefaultConstructor
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: An empty default constructor can be removed.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.
A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: college.wyk.app.commons.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.coolerfall.download.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
okhttp3.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (MILLIS_IN_A_MONTH * 6) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: MILLIS_IN_A_MONTH * 6
Parentheses in (stack?.currentPage?.plus(1)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: stack?.currentPage?.plus(1)
Parentheses around the lambda ({ it <= ' ' }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (diffInSeconds % 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: diffInSeconds % 60
